overview: Celebrate the Celtic spirit with host/filmmaker/musician Andrea Wozny and her fellow Northport Pipe & Drum bandmates as they celebrate St. Patrick's Day in Bayport-Blue Point, Long Island, at the Grey Horse Tavern. Weaving together music, history, and culture, the film goes behind the scenes to capture the experience of life in the band during this festive piping season.
title: Bagpipes Calling!
